testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed And user select gender type.................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "test@example.com" field...............................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When login with valid info "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with invalid info "test@example1.com12" and "P@ssw0rd"......passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.system-out: Given user press on currency button and selects euro........................passed Then â‚¬ should be displayed for product currency.............................passed
